name: serverest
description: Projeto de automação de testes para ServeRest

scripts.generate:backend-report: mkdir -p mochawesome-report && mochawesome-merge cypress-results/backend/*.json > mochawesome-report/backend-report.json && marge mochawesome-report/backend-report.json -f backend-report -o mochawesome-report --inline
scripts.generate:frontend-report: mkdir -p mochawesome-report && mochawesome-merge cypress-results/frontend/*.json > mochawesome-report/frontend-report.json && marge mochawesome-report/frontend-report.json -f frontend-report -o mochawesome-report --inline
scripts.test:all: npm run api:dev && npm run ui:dev && npm run k6:run

author: Henrique Marcossi
